content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan Mamani, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. However, I am looking to maximize my gains, so I would like to start with a higher price. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'm looking for the lowest possible price. Thank you for your time. I would like to agree to the rental price of 1000 Euros per month.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible price. However, I am looking to maximize my gains, so I cannot agree to that price. I would like to suggest a rental price of 1200 Euros per month. Is that a price that you are willing to consider?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I'm willing to pay 1100 Euros per month, but I need to know more about other fees associated with the rental.

Can you tell me more about the fees associated with the rental?

Thank you for your time.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Certainly, Juan. In addition to the monthly rental price, there are some additional fees associated with the apartment. There is a one-time security deposit of 200 Euros, which will be returned to you at the end of the lease term, provided that you have fulfilled your obligations under the lease agreement. There is also a monthly utilities fee of 150 Euros, which is separate from the rental price.

I hope this information helps you make a decision about the rental price. Let me know if you have any further questions.
name: Heinrich Heine
